text: Ladir was a municipality in the district Surselva in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2014, the former municipalities of Ladir, Castrisch, Ilanz, Luven, Pitasch, Riein, Ruschein, Schnaus, Sevgein, Duvin, Pigniu, Rueun and Siat merged into the new municipality of Ilanz/Glion. Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Ladir
